markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Scrabbling Ribcage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2030)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The ribs of a scrabbling ribcage are connected to either a sternum or vertebral column, but not both, allowing the ribs to function as legs.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 17

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ScrabblingRibcage.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Scrabbling Ribcage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2030)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 83</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), fatigued, [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 3, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 3, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 3, piercing 3, slashing 3

**Weaknesses**
bludgeoning 3

**Scrabble** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature moves away from the scrabbling ribcage, or a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) by the scrabbling ribcage [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) from it; **Effect** The ribcage Strides or [Climbs](/Actions.aspx?ID=33). This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jagged ribs +7,
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d8 bludgeoning, DC 17

**Skittering Rush** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The scrabbling ribcage Strides or [Climbs](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) twice, with its Speeds increased by 10 feet for this movement.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-317" />
name: Scrabbling Ribcage
